mapper.select: /* selectSchedule */ SELECT IFNULL(TSS.SCHM_SEQ, '') AS schmSeq, IFNULL(TSS.SCH_SEQ, '') AS schSeq, IFNULL(TSS.SCH_TITLE, '') AS schTitle, IFNULL(TSS.SCH_CONTENT, '') AS schContent, DATE_FORMAT(TSS.START_DATE, '%Y%m%d%H%i') AS startDate, DATE_FORMAT(TSS.END_DATE, '%Y%m%d%H%i') AS endDate, IFNULL(TSS.ALL_DAY_YN, '') AS alldayYn, DATE_FORMAT(TSS.CREATE_DATE, '%Y%m%d%H%i') AS createDate, IFNULL(TSS.CREATE_SEQ, '') AS createSeq, CASE WHEN TSS.MODIFY_DATE IS NOT NULL THEN DATE_FORMAT(TSS.MODIFY_DATE, '%Y%m%d%H%i') ELSE '' END AS modifyDate, IFNULL(TSS.MODIFY_SEQ, '') AS modifySeq FROM T_SC_SCH TSS WHERE 1 = 1 AND TSS.SCHM_SEQ = #{schedule.schmSeq} AND TSS.SCH_SEQ = #{schedule.schSeq} AND TSS.USE_YND = 'Y'

/* selectParticipants */ SELECT IFNULL(tssu.CDE_SEQ, '') AS cdeSeq, IFNULL(tssu.CDE_TYPE, '') AS cdeType, IFNULL(tssu.SCH_PARTITION_TYPE, '') AS schPartitionType, IFNULL(tssu.SCH_AUTORITY, '') AS schAutority FROM T_SC_SCH_USER TSSU WHERE 1 = 1 AND TSSU.SCHM_SEQ = #{schedule.schmSeq} AND TSSU.SCH_SEQ = #{schedule.schSeq} AND TSSU.SCH_PARTITION_TYPE = '10' AND TSSU.USE_YND = 'Y'

/* selectDisclosureScopes */ SELECT IFNULL(TSSU.CDE_SEQ, '') AS cdeSeq, IFNULL(TSSU.CDE_TYPE, '') AS cdeType, IFNULL(TSSU.SCH_PARTITION_TYPE, '') AS schPartitionType, IFNULL(TSSU.SCH_AUTORITY, '') AS schAutority FROM T_SC_SCH_USER TSSU WHERE 1 = 1 AND TSSU.SCHM_SEQ = #{schedule.schmSeq} AND TSSU.SCH_SEQ = #{schedule.schSeq} AND TSSU.SCH_PARTITION_TYPE = '20' AND TSSU.USE_YND = 'Y'
